title: Start
body:
<<You>>
*I open my eyes, face on the ground*
uhhhgg... what happened...
<<UN>>
Get up meat bag. We have an island to take over.
<<You>>
I look up to see a weird dino-shaped man.
[[That’s a mask right?|1A]]
[[What are you?? And why are you bigger than a horse on steroids???|1B]]
[[Please spare my life!!|1C]]

title: 1A
body:
<<UN>>
<<emotion happy>>
Im real alright!
<<emotion normal>>
Im as dino as you are human!
[[2nd]]

title: 1B
body:
<<UN>>
<<emotion happy>>
I am Dilophosaurus and I am the strongest of my kind!!
<<addmeter 5>>
[[2nd]]

title: 1C
body:
<<UN>>
<<emotion angry>>
Relax boy!!
WE DONT NEED THAT WEEKNESS HERE!!!
[[2nd]]

title: 2nd
body:
<<emotion normal>>
My name is Diego.
I need humans like you to join my fight against the T-rex.
[[I’m not fighting in your so call war|2A]]
[[T-rex huh? I think you just want extra bodies to throw at him.|2B]]
[[You want “me”? I just a visitor, how exactly will I be useful against an T-rex|2C]]

title: 2A
body:
<<emotion angry>>
This war I’m fighting…. is for everyone and I know you have no where to get out so what is it going to be. Death or Honor?
[[Please… just let me go. This is crazy!!!|A1]]
[[Why this particular T-rex?|A2]]
[[If I join your fight…will you let me go?|A3]]

title: 2B
body:
Everyone has a place in my army and your place will be very efficient in my plans.
[[What do I have to offer?|B1]]
[[Are you planning to use me as bait for the T-rex?|B2]]
[[Who is in your army?|B3]]

title: 2C
body:
Your the visitor which means they gave you access to every building on the island.
[[This card? You just want me to gather information?|C1]]
[[So I will be giving you a tactical advantage over the T-rex?|C2]]
[[You can find some other person|C3]]

title: A2
body:
IT killed my family and not only that it went on a rampage massacring anyone in its path. I have my own reasons, but you have your own reason as well.
<<You>>
Fine...
Ill join.
<<emotion happy>>
<<diego>>
really?
SWEET!
<<addmeter 10>>
[[3rd]]

title: A3
body:
<<emotion normal>>
Like a Pardon? I will give you one if we won the war and if your still alive
<<You>>
Fine...
Ill join.
<<emotion happy>>
<<diego>>
really?
SWEET!
<<addmeter 20>>
[[3rd]]

title: B1
body:
<<addmeter 20>>
Your position involves getting intel and accessing buildings to which I have no access to.
[[3rd]]

title: B2
body:
<<addmeter 5>>
That was one of my ideas, but since you have the card, I have a better idea for you.
[[3rd]]

title: B3
body:
I have a group of velociraptor, humans, and Triceptops.
<<addmeter 5>>
[[3rd]]

title: C1
body:
<<emotion angry>>
Information is power. I know that the T-rex thinks it is the strongest. It true, but his advantages is only physical.
[[3rd]]

title: C2
body:
<<addmeter 20>>
The T-rex strength is limited and with the amount of enemies he has, he will be taken down successfully.
[[3rd]]

title: C3
body:
<<emotion sad>>
The other guy is gone…
<<emotion angry>>
and you don’t have a choice.
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[3rd]]
